pkgmetadata.longdescription: Deal with Bratteli Graphs // Utilities for Bratteli graphs. A tree is an example of a Bratteli graph. The package provides a function which generates a 'LaTeX' file that renders the given Bratteli graph. It also provides functions to compute the dimensions of the vertices, the intrinsic kernels and the intrinsic distances. Intrinsic kernels and distances were introduced by Vershik (2014) doi:10.1007/s10958-014-1958-0.
